description: Submission of details for phase MP4 (Plot H11a and H11b) as required by Schedule 3, paragraphs 29.6 and 29.13 (Marketing of Shared Ownership Wheelchair Accessible Dwellings) of the section 106 agreement relating to planning permission ref. 12/AP/1092 (Outline application for: Redevelopment to provide a mixed use development comprising a number of buildings ranging between 13.13m (AOD) and 104.8m (AOD) in height with capacity for between 160,579sqm GEA (min) and 254,000sqm GEA (max) residential floorspace together with retail (Class A1-A5), business (Class B1), leisure and community (Class D2 and D1), energy centre (sui generis) uses. New landscaping, park and public realm, car parking, means of access and other associated works).
site_name: The Heygate Estate And Surrounding Bound By New Kent Road (A201) To The North Rodney Place And Rodney Road To The East Wansey Street To The South, And Walworth Road (A215) And Elephant Road To The West
